result.reason: A failed RDP connection attempt should not tear down all other active RDP sessions — this indicates shared error handling or a catch-all disconnect path in the RDP protocol code.
result.approach: Audit the RDP OnDisconnected/OnFatalError handlers to ensure a single connection failure is scoped to that connection only and does not propagate disconnects to sibling RDP sessions sharing the same panel or connection list.

attempts.raw_output: {"decision":"implement","reason":"A failed RDP connection attempt should not tear down all other active RDP sessions — this indicates shared error handling or a catch-all disconnect path in the RDP protocol code.","priority":"P2-bug","estimated_files":["mRemoteNG/Connection/Protocol/RDP/RdpProtocol.cs","mRemoteNG/Connection/Protocol/RDP/RdpErrorCodes.cs","mRemoteNG/Connection/ConnectionInitiator.cs"],"approach":"Audit the RDP OnDisconnected/OnFatalError handlers to ensure a single connection failure is scoped to that connection only and does not propagate disconnects to sibling RDP sessions sharing the same panel or connection list."}
